text:
:rotating_light:Are you a HubSpot wizard? :rotating_light:

We have an exciting opportunity on an amazing IT team at OpenWorks! We hiring a Senior HubSpot Developer - onsite in Phoenix, AZ. The ideal candidate has done standalone dev work, enabled marketing and sales internally, ahs experience integrating an ERP and built a user experience in HubSpot. Feel Free to reach out to me with questions or apply!

<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/4109060628>
